item.description: Come check out dragon boating with Living Root! We're a co-ed dragon boat team and we're always looking for new paddlers to join us. This is a great way to get in shape, stay in shape, meet people, and do something fun and competitive.  We meet at 6 pm at the docks behind the Barking Crab (88 Sleeper Street in Boston).  It's a short walk from South Station on the Red Line, or the Courthouse stop on the Silver line.  We paddle rain or shine, so dress for the weather.  We can lock up anything you don't want to bring with you on the boat.  Bring a bottle of water, and we'll provide all the paddling equipment you'll need.  We often head out for a quick bite to eat after practice, and you're welcome to join us.  Send questions to: Dave Parker at dfitzparker@gmail.com [url=http://www.livingroot.org/]www.livingroot.org[/url]
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the tall guy with a paddle or a clipboard.
item.name: Dragon Boat Practice Session
